#summary Functional Requirements of the Apps Script Configuration Client expressed as use cases.

= Apps Script Configuration Client Functional Requirements =

==Title: _Initialize and bind the spreadsheet to the datastore_==

==Primary Actor: _Application Owner_==

===Pre-conditions===
This use case requires that the SitesWrapper-GAE-GWT software has just been installed in (deployed to) Google App Engine as an application administered by the same Google account as the primary actor in the use case, and that the primary actor knows the *application id* of the application in Google App Engine.
